name: User Defined Applications
summary: Description of applications desired by diffrent people.
short_description:
If someone have idea for application please provide description of application and send it to one of 

emails:

wojtekkrzysiek@hotmail.com, fialkwork@hotmail.com, wfialkiewicz@hotmail.com. 

If I find application idea interesting than that description send will be posted in Wiki section. Some of the description posted in Wiki section will be developed by my and presented as separate project. Than person who sent description of idea will can send me bank account number which will be presented in Wiki of separate Project of Application.
